mapper.select: select ci.id, ci.title, ci.subtitle, ci.pay_value, sc.stock, ci.start_time from coupon_info ci, seckill_coupon sc where ci.id = #{id} and ci.id = sc.coupon_id
mapper.update: update seckill_coupon set stock = stock - 1 where coupon_id = #{id} and stock > 0
mapper.insert: insert into coupon_order (id, user_id, coupon_id, status) values (#{id}, #{userId}, #{couponId}, #{status})
mapper.select: select count(id) from coupon_order where coupon_id = #{couponId} and user_id = #{userId}
